channel.title: running on Keith's Diary and Other Stuff
channel.description: Recent content in running on Keith's Diary and Other Stuff

item.title: Subway Canada day 10k
item.description: Garth won the 10k road race in Grand Bay-Westfield Darrell with Garth after the run {{ more }} We stopped of at Gina and Errols this morning and collect a nice Kona CX bike for me to ride while we are here. Then it’s off to Grand Bay-Westfiels for the Canada Day 10 mile road race, Garth running in the 10k race which he won even though Alex Coffin messed up the finish which apparently was Garth’s fault.
